name: InfinitScrollView
summary: A UIKit lib that allow infinite scrolll apun a finite data source
description: InfiniteScrollView is a lightweight, highly customizable open source library designed for iOS developers using UIKit. This library seamlessly integrates with your existing UIKit projects to enable infinite scrolling capabilities, even when working with a finite set of data. It's perfect for enhancing the user experience in applications where lengthy lists or collections can benefit from continuous scroll effects without the end-user ever hitting a "dead end."
